experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Over the past 5 years, Irham Rahmat Saleh has consistently delivered high-quality web solutions for various clients and companies. He specializes in modern front-end technologies, always striving to create seamless, responsive, and engaging user interfaces. His experience covers working on both small business websites and large-scale applications, adapting quickly to new challenges and requirements.

Irham's dedication to continuous learning ensures that he stays updated with the latest industry trends, resulting in innovative and effective digital products.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a Software Engineer, Front-end developer, Irham Rahmat Saleh is skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js, and React. He has strong expertise in implementing responsive designs, optimizing website performance, and integrating APIs. Irham is adept at using modern development tools such as Git, Webpack, and Tailwind CSS.

He is also experienced in collaborating with designers and backend developers to deliver complete, production-ready solutions.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Irham Rahmat Saleh brings excellent communication, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities to every project. He is known for his attention to detail, adaptability, and commitment to meeting deadlines.

He thrives in collaborative environments, always eager to share knowledge and support his team to achieve common goals.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
My name is Irham Rahmat Saleh. I am a passionate web developer with 5 years of hands-on experience in building and optimizing user-focused websites and applications. I enjoy translating ideas into digital solutions and am committed to delivering reliable, efficient, and visually appealing results.

Driven by curiosity and a love for technology, I always look for ways to improve and stay ahead in this fast-changing industry.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am constantly learning and exploring new technologies, frameworks, and design trends. My interests include web development, UI/UX design, and creating meaningful digital experiences. I also enjoy participating in tech communities and collaborating on open-source projects.

education.title: education
education.description:
I have always been passionate about learning and self-development, focusing on both formal education and independent study. I graduated from high school with a strong interest in technology and pursued my degree in computer science to deepen my knowledge.

Since then, I have continuously expanded my skills through online courses, certifications, and practical projects.

files.high-school: I attended 'Las vi√±as' high school, where I developed my interest in technology and programming.
files.university: I continued my studies at university, majoring in computer science and actively participating in tech projects and organizations.
